body.name: Tovala Smart Oven Pro, 6-in-1 Countertop Convection Oven - Steam, Toast, Air Fry, Bake, Broil, and Reheat - Smartphone Control Steam & Air Fryer Oven Combo - With Meal Subscription Credit ($50 Value)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 7 mins
features: Versatile 6-in-1 Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo - Unleash your culinary skills with our air fryer toaster oven combo that can switch between Air Fry, Steam, Bake, Broil, Reheat, and Toast cooking methods. Create custom, automated cook cycles with 1 or more modes for perfectly cooked meals every time.

Controlled by Integrated Smartphone App - Easily set your microwave air fryer combo to use one or multiple modes, receive notifications when your meal is ready, enjoy the convenience of Tovala Meals (sold separately), and browse a wide selection of over 1,000 scannable groceries for an effortless cooking experience.

Effortless Cooking at Your Fingertips: With the smartphone app, access hundreds of presets and make chef-perfected recipes with ease. Simply follow the prep steps in the Tovala app and press "cook" to let the convection countertop oven using air fry, steam, and other cooking modes do the rest.

1,000+ Name Brands at Your Fingertips - Discover a wide selection of well-known pantry essentials and frozen foods for quick and delicious meals. No need to preheat your airfryer toaster oven! Make the most of the spacious air fryer basket and compact sheet pan included with the air fryer toaster oven for ultimate convenience.

Effortless Meal Subscription Made Easy - Enjoy fresh, pre-prepared meals with just a touch of a button. Our convection oven countertop is compatible with Tovala's meal subscription service, delivering perfect cooking results with minimal prep. Each oven comes with a $50 credit for 3-5 Tovala meals. You have the flexibility to pause, skip, or cancel your subscription at any time (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great toaster oven with an air fryer.
reviews.reviewText: I started searching for a new toaster oven to replace my older unit. I was looking for something that did more than just toast bread. I did a lot of research on a lot of different brands before hitting on this one. What really got my attention was it had 5 different modes for use. Not only would it toast but it also had an air fryer which I like. (I had a large bulky air fryer before and did not like it). If a buyer wants to purchase meals that go with this oven, can. They can set up an account with Tovala and have meals delivered to their home. I received a four - meal packet when I made the initial purchase. The meals were very good and preparation was simple. The oven has a scanner on the front which scans a bar code on the meal and cooks it accordingly. I chose not to subscribe to the meal service simply because I like preparing my own food. Also, it seems a bit pricey for me as well. That being said, the service might be just the right thing for a really busy or older person who my have trouble preparing their own meals. There are some store-bought brands that the scanner will recognize. A list of the companies is shown in the instructions.One thing I really like about this is I can place a piece of bread in for toasting, press the "toast" mode, choose "1" for time, (4.35 minutes), and when it shuts off, the bread is perfectly toasted. No under or over cook. No burnt bread.Using the air fryer takes some time to get to know the settings. I've found if the instructions on the product itself is followed, the results are pretty good. I've had to modify the time on some things, such as frozen potato wedges, but after using it for a few times I know how much time is required. Using the basket makes for easy cooking and cleanup as well.Oh, did I mention, you can control it with your smart phone as well?I conclusion, I would highly recommend this oven to someone looking to replace an older unit. It does so much more and does it well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasty meals and never burned toast!
reviews.reviewText: This little oven is amazing! Very high quality and easy to use, once connected to WiFi with the app downloaded. The meals ordered through Tovala are delicious, healthy and easy to prepare. It makes everything from toast to crispy air fried party wings!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like the oven
reviews.reviewText: The meals are rather expensive and come in a single serving. They are delicious but are very costly per serving. The bar code bars on the meal boxes are easy to scan and the meal cooks perfectly. However, when the meal is done you can barely hear when the oven signals the meal is ready.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quick cook
reviews.reviewText: I love how convenient it is to just pull the oven out plug it up and have my food heated in minutes. All the different settings it has of cooling, I use air fry and bake the most. It’s throughly cooks the food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Manufacturer customer service
reviews.reviewText: It cooks well but certain foods that cause splattering into the oven’s walls will create smoke inside this oven. My Dyson read our air quality as “very unhealthy “ while baking certain foods.The air fry rack is chrome, which it turned rusty and black after trying to wash it with water and soap. Not food safe, I had to use parchment paper or foil to prevent contamination to my foods (see my pictures).The worst part is their customer service, Tovala won’t take responsibility for troubleshooting their ovens or accepting returns. Thanks goodness I bought it through Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for single people
reviews.reviewText: I love this oven. Works as it says.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about this except the color.
reviews.reviewText: After using this a few months, I adore this oven. It's very well made, heats evenly, and the smart features are brilliant. My wife is not good at cooking, and having the bar code scanner work with some of the groceries that she eats (I wish it were programmable to add more) has been a godsend.The pre-programmed complex cook cycles are extremely well thought out. I've never been able to cook chicken as good as I did before I got this, and I've started making homemade pizzas in it instead of ordering out because it cooks them so well. I've also added my own programs for things I make regularly that aren't in the database which was very easy. I don't even use my full sized oven anymore.The Tovala meal service has pretty good (not great) food, but it is very overpriced so I cancelled it. The app and meal ordering process are very well done, though.The color, unfortunately, just doesn't match any other appliance ever made and looks very out of place in the kitchen. Also because it's light there are yellow stains from where the smoke escapes around the door that are literally impossible to clean. I would have ordered the black one except I didn't care for the steam aspect of it (it will constantly tell you to refill the water), and I wanted the two-speed air fryer to make things crispier.I might find a way to paint it black, honestly, and it would be perfect. If it ever stops working I'd order another one without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works, but it's slow
reviews.reviewText: If you don't plan on using this oven for the Tovala meals, probably look for something else. The steam function is nice, but I could live without it. Preheating takes as long as a traditional oven. The fan isn't as strong as a regular air fryer, so it takes longer to cook, even at a higher temp, than an air fryer.The scan function for other foods is a good idea, but of the items that have actually scanned, a couple had wildly incorrect heating programs.I really don't like that if the timer ends you have to turn off the oven and completely reset the function and temp.Overall, if I had to do it over again, I wouldn't buy this. I would go straight air fryer or save my pennies for another 2 months and bought a different brand.

In Canada you cannot download the app. Without the app you cannot connect the oven to WI-FI. Without that connection you can't use the "smart" functionality of the oven. The oven itself appears well made, and I'm sure it's fine if connectivity is available. Be aware that the smart functions seem to be focused on the companies subscription food offerings, which are also not available outside the lower 48 States.
